subject: Re: Not all rituals are on the website?

full_threads.body:
Hi Nic,

I hope you are doing well.

Confirming created a new field for each sections. Here are the fields that enables the section.

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Nic,

Sure thing - just looped in support@wolfiq.com.au to action this for you.

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Nic.

Confirming that we have completed the transfer of the rituals under Landing Page post type.

The pages are now set to private and you can publish it once you have completed the details for the page.

We also have added the function to add either a CTA button or an embed form in the Banner section.

Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with.

Hi Cindy,

Thanks for the update and the plan to revert to a separate post type for the custom template. That sounds good. Let me know once it's live.

No questions from my side for now.

Cheers,

Nic



NIC FRANKLIN

Founder + Managing Director

P: + 61 434 929 892

IG: @pulpagency_

pulpagency.com.au

The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not occur in the future.

Hi Nic.

Following up on the call with Andy earlier this week - after reviewing the setup, we've decided to proceed with creating a separate post type for the custom template, which we've named "Landing."

This was the original approach we had before moving it to Rituals CPT, so we're now reverting to that and will update the ACF field settings accordingly to align with the template structure.

We'll keep you posted once everything is finalized and the setup is complete.

Please let us know if you have any questions in the meantime!

Hi Nic.

Regarding your question about the overview page:
  • We'll need to modify the ritual overview page to include a condition that determines which rituals should be displayed.
  • To support this, we’ll add a new field to the ritual edit page that specifies whether a ritual should be included for Google or not.

We estimate the time to be around 2–5 hours, including all necessary adjustments.

This update will also involve modifying the single ritual page to conditionally display a button or form.

Let me know if that works for you.
@joel just making sure you've seen this. Thanks!

Hey Cindy,

Thank you for the walk through, that's really helpful

Can we please also have the option to add a button rather than a contact form? We need to be able to have both options.

The reason for this is that in the case of the websites normal use case we would just have header copy, body copy - button link out to fresha.

But in the case where i create a variation for Google or meta ads we might want to place a form under the body copy to help improve conversions.

Also just confirming that if i create another ritual page that is just for google or meta ads, that it wont be included in the rituals overview page?

Cheers,

Nic

Hi Nic.

Are you referring to making edits on each individual Ritual post, or are you asking about how to edit the template itself?

Currently, the setup allows you to update the content of each Ritual through the ACF we’ve provided.

Here’s a quick walkthrough of how we’ve configured it on the backend.

Regarding your mention of doing "variations," I just want to clarify—are you thinking of creating different layouts for the Rituals? If so, that’s definitely possible.

We’ll just need to ensure each post is assigned to its correct template. There shouldn’t be any issues with that, but it would involve building an additional template along with a separate set of ACF fields to support the layout variations.

Please let me know if this answers your questions, or if anything needs further clarification—we’re happy to help.

Thank you.

Hey Team!

How do I edit these pages? and in future if I want to do variations of the pages and duplicates is that going to break things?

Cheers,

Nic

Hi Nic.

I just cleared the server cache to ensure you'll be seeing the correct layout.

I also attached the screenshot on how I see it on my end.

Please let me know if you're still experiencing the same issue.

Hey Cindy,

Thanks for that, we'll get moving on our end right away.

Can you please check the rituals page, the content isnt pulling through?

Cheers,

Nic

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hi Corbin.

The page went missing because the new pages were initially set to private so you could complete them before they were published.

We've now restored the live site and moved the four pages to the staging environment instead.
  • https://staging-sagespace.wolfiq.cloud/ritual/the-align/
  • https://staging-sagespace.wolfiq.cloud/ritual/the-glow/
  • https://staging-sagespace.wolfiq.cloud/ritual/the-essential-ritual/
  • https://staging-sagespace.wolfiq.cloud/ritual/the-essential-ritual-2/

Once you’ve finished updating the Ritual pages, we’ll publish them on staging for final review and then push them live.

The staging credentials should be the same as your live site.

Let us know once the updates are complete, and we’ll take care of the rest.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hi Corbin,

Thanks for flagging.

Looping in @Wolf IQ Support to help look into this.

We'll come back to you shortly with an update.

Thanks,
Andy
